# ENTITY::GET_ENTITY_BONE_COUNT

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the number of bones in the entity
